front.title: Information as a bird with wings that flies and hits the user device screen as Icons

abstract.t: The document proposes a WWW as an intelligent being that delivers informationto users. This can be combined with a Single SignON solution for the WWW seen as oneGiant computer. Imagine having a handy device and you travel to Bangkok and in the morning whenyou authenticate to WWW, your WWW navigation screen shows you very useful Icons that can create abetter experience for you.
